title: About not me
text:
My Journey Before SIT
Before joining SIT, I pursued a diploma in Business Intelligence and Analytics, where I developed a strong foundation in using data to drive smarter business decisions.
During that time, I was exposed to a mix of technical and business subjects, including: - Data visualization using tools like Tableau and Power BI - Basic data modeling and SQL - Predictive analytics using Excel and R - Business strategy and case analysis
Although I didn‚Äôt have a formal Final Year Project, I worked on several mini-projects and coursework that helped sharpen my ability to extract insights from messy data and communicate them clearly.
This experience sparked my interest in data-driven decision making ‚Äî which is what led me to continue exploring analytics at a deeper level in SIT.



What I Gained

A solid grasp of BI tools and dashboards

The ability to communicate findings to both technical and non-technical stakeholders

Curiosity to explore more advanced machine learning and AI applications

title: travelexperience
text:
My Travel Experience
One of my favourite ways to reset and reflect is through travel. Whether it‚Äôs short weekend getaways or long-haul flights, I enjoy exploring new cultures, foods, and the way people live.

title: reflection
text:
I used ChatGPT by OpenAI.
I chose it because it is easy to talk to, fast, and gives helpful answers. I can ask it to explain things step by step.




Here are some examples:

It helped me create the content like aboutnotme.qmd and travel.qmd.
It helped me fix mistakes I didn‚Äôt understand by giving suggestions.
It guided me on how to update _quarto.yml.






Fast and always ready to help.
Clear answers in plain English.
Helps when I don‚Äôt understand instructions.






Sometimes the answer is too long or too complicated.
I need to double-check if the answer is correct.
It doesn‚Äôt always know exactly what I mean unless I am very clear.


‚ÄúEven though the tool is smart, I still need to think for myself.‚Äù
‚Äî My own reflection








Screenshot of ChatGPT helping me







I can use GenAI to help me with coding, writing, and explaining things I don‚Äôt understand.
I can use it to prepare presentations and clean up my writing.

title: reflection
text: GenAI tools like ChatGPT are very helpful for someone like me who prefers short, clear instructions and step-by-step help. It makes working on projects feel less stressful.
